classes.name: Writer
classes.description: Converts the canvas document into a PNG Image.

functions.name: marshal
functions.description:
Export the content to a PNG image. The result can be set as src="...." because the result is encoded as data source url data:image/png;base64....

Method signature has been changed from version 2.10.1 to version 3.0.0.
The parameter resultCallback is required and new. The method calls the callback instead of return the result.

parameters.name: resultCallback
parameters.description: the method to call on success. The first argument is the dataUrl, the second is the base64 formated png image

constructor.name: Writer
